current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide that the individual mandate under the Patient
		  Protection and Affordable Care Act shall not be construed as a
		  tax.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: ruled that the individual mandate imposed by

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:10106

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 1501 of the
			 Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1501

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, has certain
			 functional characteristics of a tax and could be sustained as an exercise of
			 Congress's power to tax under article I, section 8, clause 1 of the
			 Constitution.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010/s:1002

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
1004 of the Health Care and
			 Education Reconciliation Act of 2010
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010/s:1004

header.#text:
Classification
			 of individual mandate as non-tax

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the following new
			 subsection:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 1501 of the Patient Protection and Affordable
			 Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1501

text.#text:
Nothing in the amendments made by this section shall
				be construed as imposing any tax or as an exercise of any power of Congress
				enumerated in article I, section 8, clause 1 of, or the 16th amendment to, the
				Constitution.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 1501 of the Patient Protection and
			 Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1501

text.#text:
The amendment made by this section shall apply as if
			 included in the enactment of

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S560 IS: To provide that the individual mandate under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act shall not be construed as a tax.
